title: Tether Becomes 18th Largest US Treasury Holder with $127B
summary: Tether now holds $127B in US government debt, surpassing countries like Germany and South Korea to become the 18th largest Treasury holder globally. This strategic positioning reinforces liquidity while preparing for potential stablecoin regulation and embeds Tether deeper into traditional finance infrastructure.

title: Concrete Launches AUSD Institutional Yield Vault on Katana
summary: Concrete introduced an institutional-grade yield vault for AUSD holders on Katana platform, featuring no lockups, active capital management, and security audits from Zellic and Halborn. The vault generates real yield through on-chain strategies while offering KAT rewards and ecosystem incentives.

title: Crypto Exchange Volume Surges to $1.7T in July
summary: July crypto exchange volume hit $1.71T, up 55% from June's $1.1T, marking the highest since February. Binance led with $683B volume while decentralized exchanges reached $435.3B, driven by Bitcoin's record monthly close at $115,644 and Ether's 50% surge.

title: US Crypto ETFs See $1B Outflows to Start August
summary: After record July performance, US Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs experienced nearly $1B in combined outflows at August's start. Bitcoin ETFs lost $812M while Ethereum ETFs saw $152M withdrawn, with most outflows from Fidelity, Ark, and Bitwise funds while BlackRock remained stable.
